column4: hi, I'm an ubuntu/linux newbie, I've just installed. I use the Ubuntu 6.10. I need to mount my windows partitions. I followed the instructions, but when I search @ /media/windows but it is empty
sounds like you have not actually mounted the physical drive... you have made a fake drive with fstab...
im not sure of your hardware setup... you need to know it... and how it is partitioned
